thread.title: NRF Supports Amendment to Broaden Senate Cybersecurity Bill
thread.title_full: NRF Supports Amendment to Broaden Senate Cybersecurity Bill - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: NRF Supports Amendment to Broaden Senate Cybersecurity Bill
text: WASHINGTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)--The National Retail Federation today asked Senate leadership to support an amendment that would give liability protection to businesses that share cyber threats with the Federal Bureau of Investigations and the U.S. Secret Service rather than just the Department of Homeland Security. â€œThis amendment recognizes the reality that for non-critical infrastructure sectors, the FBI and Secret Service are our longstanding partners and primary points of contact in fighting c ...
